content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: An realy interesting problem who can l'arnaque formula

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Interesting mathematics puzzle

Goal
* Please change "the numbers" to "the natural numbers".

* Consider adding a bullet point (•) before the two sum descriptions for clarity.

Input
* Please add line numbers in bold in front of all descriptions. For example, the first one is "<<Line 1>>:".

Constraints
* Please delete the second constraint. The condition is implied and need not be stated.

Output
* After deleting the constraint per above, please also delete "[[a]] and [[b]]" in the output description.

Cases
* Please remove the trailing newlines from the input of the cases below:
  • General number (Test 1)
  • Extreme ends (Test 4)
  • Middle consecutive (Validator 4)

* Please remove the trailing newline from the output of "Even even bigger numbers" (Validator 3).

* Each test and its validator should cover the SAME scenario with slightly different inputs and outputs. Please revise the cases accordingly.

  • Specifically, Test 3 doesn't match Validator 3, and Test 4 doesn't match Validator 4.

  • Also note that you aren't limited to 4 pairs of cases. Feel free to add additional test/validator pairs as needed.

Thanks.
